caption.p: Comparison of SARS-CoV-2 IgG in SARS-CoV-2 PCR-positive samples analyzed by the Epitope and Euroimmun ELISA. Red symbols: negative by Epitope and positive by Euroimmun; Green symbols: positive by Epitope and negative by Euroimmun; Orange symbols: borderline by Epitope and positive by Euroimmun; Black symbols: borderline by Euroimmun and positive by Epitope; Blue symbols: borderline by Euroimmun and negative by Epitope. Open circles indicate correlative results between the two assays. (For interpretation of the references to color in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the web version of this article.)
